profileFacet.login: Log in to a Neos account. This will make you leave the current session.
profileFacet.logout: Log out of your Neos account.
profileFacet.setImage: Click here while holding an image to set it as your profile picture.
onlineStatus.invisible: Set your status to 'Invisible'. (You will appear as offline to others.)
coreWorlds.contentHub: Opens a new private instance of the Neos Hub world.
coreWorlds.MTC: Opens a new private instance of the Metaverse Training Center. (tutorial world)
coreWorlds.cloudHome: Opens a new private instance of your cloud home.
toolsFacet.spawnAvatarCreator: Spawn an avatar creator that can be used to turn an imported 3D model into an avatar.
toolsFacet.spawnFullBodyCalibrator: Spawn the fullbody calibrator which can be used to set up fullbody tracking for an avatar.
toolsFacet.createNewWorld: Create a new, mostly empty world, based on some preset.
toolsFacet.depositNCR: Deposit Neos Credits from an external wallet in your in-game wallet.
toolsFacet.withdrawNCR: Withdraw Neos Credits to an external wallet.
toolsFacet.setup2FA: Setup two-factor authentication for your account.
toolsFacet.debug: Open the debug panel. This can be used to get performance metrics, revoke bans or manage what domains you have allowed/denied host access for.
toolsFacet.buyStorage: Use Neos Credits to buy more inventory storage.
toggleSeatedMode: Turn seated mode on or off.
nameplateVisibility.nonContacts: Nameplates are shown only for people not on your contacts list.
nameplateVisibility.none: No nameplates are shown at all.
debugPanel.tabs.gatherJobs: Shows what assets Neos is currently downloading.
debugPanel.tabs.worlds: Shows general performance metrics about all the worlds you have open.
debugPanel.tabs.focusedWorld: Shows specific performance metrics about the world you are currently in.
debugPanel.tabs.assets: Shows how many of what type of asset you currently have loaded.
debugPanel.tabs.webHosts: This lets you revoke your decision on previously allowed or denied host access pop-ups.
debugPanel.tabs.bans: This lets you see info about and unban users that you have previously banned from your sessions.
debugPanel.special.forceFullGarbageColle: Forces the C# garbage collector to run.
debugPanel.webHosts.removeSetting:
Revoke this decision.
(Next time something tries to access this host, you will be asked to confirm or deny that again)
debugPanel.bans.removeBan: Unban this user from your sessions.
closeWorld.saveChanges: Saves all changes made to the world.
closeWorld.saveAs: Allows you to save this modified instance of the world as a separate item somewhere in your inventory.
closeWorld.discardChanges: Discards all changes made to this world since you last saved it.
exit.saveHomes: Exits Neos and saves any changes you've made to your 'Local' world and cloud home.
exit.discardHomes:
Exits Neos and discards any changes you've made to your 'Local' world and cloud home.
(If you have made changes to your home world and did not yet explicitly save them, they will be lost!)
settings.myHeight: Set this to your actual, real-life height if you play in VR.
sessionControl.settings.maxUsers: The maximum amount of users that can be in this world at a time
sessionControl.settings.getSessionOrb: Spawns an orb for this session that people can use to travel here.
sessionControl.settings.getWorldOrb: Spawns an orb for this world that people can use to save it or open new instances of it.
sessionControl.settings.copySessionURL: Copies the join link to this session.
sessionControl.settings.copyWorldURL: Copies the link to this world that people can use to open new instances of it.
sessionControl.settings.saveChanges: Saves all changes made in this session to the world.
sessionControl.settings.access.private: Only people you specifically invite here can join.
sessionControl.settings.access.LAN: Only people on your local network can join.
sessionControl.settings.access.contacts: Only people on your contacts list can join.
sessionControl.settings.access.contactsP: Only people who are contacts of someone already in the session can join.
sessionControl.settings.access.registere: Only people who are logged in with a Neos account can join.
sessionControl.settings.autoKickAFKUsers:
Automatically kicks people from the session if they have been AFK for some while.
(This does not impose any penalty and they can just rejoin later if they want to.)
sessionControl.settings.maxAFKMinutes: The maximum amount of time someone can be AFK for before they automatically get kicked.
sessionControl.settings.dontShowInSessio: Prevents this session from being shown in the Worlds tab of your dash and makes it show as a hidden session in the Contacts tab.
sessionControl.settings.autosave: Makes it so that the world is automatically saved every once in a while.
sessionControl.settings.autosaveInterval: How many minutes need to pass before the world gets autosaved again.
sessionControl.settings.cleanupUnusedAss: Makes it so that assets that aren't referenced/used by anything in the world are deleted every once in a while.
sessionControl.settings.cleanupInterval: How many seconds need to pass before assets to be cleaned up again.
sessionControl.users.silence: Silences this user so nobody can hear them.
sessionControl.users.kick: Kicks this user from the session. (double-click)
sessionControl.users.ban: Bans this user from the session. (double-click)
sessionControl.permissions.setRoleForAno: Set the default permission level for people who are not logged into a Neos account to '{{PERMISSION}}'.
sessionControl.permissions.setRoleForVis: Set the default permission level for visitors to '{{PERMISSION}}'.
sessionControl.permissions.setRoleForCon: Set the default permission level for contacts of the host to '{{PERMISSION}}'.
sessionControl.permissions.setRoleForHos: Set the default permission level for the host of the session to '{{PERMISSION}}'.
sessionControl.permissions.setRoleForUse: Set the permission level for {{USERNAME}} to '{{PERMISSION}}'.
sessionControl.permissions.clearUserOver: Reset all permissions that were manually assigned for individual users back to the defaults for those users' roles.
contacts.searchBar: Click here to search for users.
contacts.inviteHere: Invite this person to your session.
contacts.giftStorage: Use NCR to gift inventory storage to this person.
contacts.removeContact: Remove this person from your contacts list.
contacts.banFromHosted:
Permanently ban this person from all sessions that you host.
(This can be undone later from the debug panel.)
contacts.banFromCurrent: Ban this person from your currently hosted session.
contacts.addContact: Add this person as a contact.
contacts.ignoreRequest:
Ignore this person's contact request.
(TODO: Is the other user able to see this?)
contacts.sendItem:
Send currently held item in the chat.
(Note: the item gets saved to your cloud storage for this and does take up space!)
contacts.recordVoiceMessage: Click and hold to record a voice message.
contacts.spawnSugarCubes: They sent you some sugar cubes... How sweet.
avatarCreator.alignHeadForward: Perfectly aligns the headset's forward direction.
avatarCreator.alignHeadUp: Perfectly aligns the headset's up direction.
avatarCreator.alignHeadRight: Perfectly aligns the headset's right direction.
avatarCreator.alignHands: Attempts to detect where the avatar's hands should be and positions them there.
avatarCreator.alignToolAnchors: Attempts to set where the avatar's equipped tools should go.
avatarCreator.useSymmetry: Automatically mirrors the left hand along the headset's position, according to where the right hand is.
avatarCreator.showAnchors: Display tool anchors and grab spheres to align those manually.
avatarCreator.setupVolumeMeter: Adds a volume meter to your avatar, this will modify your whisper bubble's brightness
avatarCreator.setupFaceTracking: Sets up face tracking on the avatar for something like the Vive face tracker.
avatarCreator.protectAvatar:
Makes it so that no one except you can save the avatar.
Protection also deletes the avatar if you spawn it into a world and leave.
avatarCreator.create: Turn the aligned model into an avatar.
inspector.objectRoot: Go up to the next object root in the hierarchy.
inspector.hierarchyUp: Go up one slot in the hierarchy.
inspector.destroySlot: Destroys the selected slot and related assets and does not trigger onDestroying events.
inspector.destroyPreserveAssets: Destroys the selected slot while preserving related assets.
inspector.insertParent: Inserts a new parent above the selected slot.
inspector.addChild: Appends a new child to the selected slot.
inspector.focusHierarchyHere: Focuses the hierarchy onto the selected slot.
inspector.attachComponent: Attach a component to the selected slot.
audioStream.panel.spatialized: Toggle whether or not the audio stream should be broadcast globally.
audioStream.panel.playForOwner: Toggle whether or not the audio stream should also play for the person streaming it.
inventory.spawnFolder:
Spawn selected folder.
(This will make it public.)
inventory.spawnFacet:
Spawn selected facet in local space.
(Facets don't work properly in desktop mode)
inventory.saveAvatar: Save your equipped avatar to this folder.
inventory.addNew: Create a new folder or save your currently held item.
inventory.favHome: Set as your default home world.
fileBrowser.importRaw: Import selected file as a raw file.
fileBrowser.addNew: Create a new Folder or export held item.
imageImport.screenshot: Import as Neos screenshot with metadata.
imageImport.LUT:
Import as a LUT.
(A LUT is a color lookup table)
modelImport.vertexColoredModel: Import as a regular 3D model with vertex colors.
modelImport.model.regular: Used for most models like props, avatars and worlds.
modelImport.model.separable: Sets the model up so that all individual pices are grabbable and can snap into place in their original position.
modelImport.scale.auto: Tries to automatically detect the scale of the model.
modelImport.scale.humanoid: Scales the model to the average height of a human. (1.8 meters/units)
modelImport.scale.meters: Use this if the model was modeled at meter scale.
modelImport.scale.millimeters: Use this if the model was modeled at millimeter scale.
modelImport.scale.centimeters: Use this if the model was modeled at centimeter scale.
modelImport.scale.inches: Use this if the model was modeled at inch scale.
createNew.3DModelMenu: 3D Models such as cubes, spheres and cylinders.
createNew.3DModel.grid: Creates a new, one-sided grid mesh.
createNew.3DModel.quad: Creates a new, one-sided quad mesh.
createNew.3DModel.triangle: Creates a new, one-sided triangle mesh.
createNew.colliderMenu: Various types and shapes of colliders.
createNew.editor.assetOptimizationWizard: Creates a new asset optmization wizard.
createNew.editor.cubemapCreator:
Creates a new cubemap creator.
This can be used to turn 6 separate images into a cubemap.
createNew.editor.worldLightSourcesWizard: Creates a new world light sources wizard.
createNew.editor.logixTransferWizard: Creates a new LogiX transfer wizard.
createNew.editor.reflectionProbeWizard: Creates a new reflection probe wizard.
createNew.editor.worldTextRendererWizard: Creates a new world text renderer wizard.
createNew.editor.userInspector:
Creates a new user inspector.
This can be used inspect users and access detailed information about them.
createNew.light.directional: Creates a new, directional light source.
createNew.light.point: Creates a new light source that shines in every direction.
createNew.materialMenu: Different materials (shaders) to apply to 3D objects.
createNew.objectMenu: Various pre-setup objects such as UI Elements, Mirrors, Cameras...
createNew.text.Basic: Creates a new piece of floating text with no outline.
createNew.text.Outline: Creates a new piece of floating text with outlines on the letters.
